body.name: Homedics 4-in-1 UV-C Portable Air Purifier - 360-Degree HEPA Filter, Air Purifiers for Bedroom and Home Small Rooms, 2 Speed Settings for Small Rooms, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 30 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 30 mins
features: BREATHE EASIER – The Homedics 4-in-1 UV-C Portable Air Purifier reduces pollen, pet dander, germs, smoke, and more to achieve clean air for all; perfect as a small room air purifier or on the go

COMPLETE CLEAN - UV-C technology and HEPA-type filtration reduce and capture 99.97% of airborne particles*; built-in carbon air filter reduces odor and VOCs while the prefilter captures larger particles
PORTABLE PURIFIER -This convenient HEPA air purifier is perfect to transport from your home to car to office; the portable air purifier fits in standard automobile cup holders for on-the-go use

CUSTOMIZED SETTINGS - Choose from 2 whisper-quiet speed settings on the ionizer air purifier and enjoy the included accent lighting; The filter lasts 2-3 months under normal usage conditions; easy to replace when needed for optimal performance
WHAT’S IN THE BOX - (1) HoMedics 4-in-1 Portable Air Purifier; (1) instruction book, (1) USB power cable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for a small space
reviews.reviewText: This unit is great for a small room and if you keep it running for a few hours, like 24 hours continuously to remove smells. The USB did not work to help charge my phone so it is useless in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, Quiet & Effective
reviews.reviewText: This portable air purifier is perfect for the car or small room! I can tell a difference having it in my full car during long drives with dogs and other people. It keeps the air fresh and clean, and the slim design is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it but the accent lighting cannot be turned off
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great little air purifier but the accent lighting cannot be turned off. It’s not whisper quiet but I have no problem with it. The white noise is not bad. The video I have here is in the low setting and you can hear how it definitely is not whisper quiet. I always have my room pitch black and this with its light on is super bright. I have to put a pillow in between myself on the bed and the bedside table just to minimize the glare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Portable travel air purifier with UV-C from a trusted brand, but no battery
reviews.reviewText: This is a small portable travel air purifier with UV-C from Homedics a trusted home brand. There is only one power button which has the unit off, low, or high. When the unit is off, the blue power button is lit up. When the unit is on low or high, the entire top of the unit emits on/off glow effect of blue light. You cannot turn the light on or off independently. The amazon listing at the time of my purchase stated "Power Source Battery Powered" but unfortunately this is incorrect. There is actually no battery built into the unit, and it must be plugged in to power on. For some people this is not an issue. I had intended on using it for travel, so that rules it out for me as I would need to then also pack a separate battery which negates the portability of the unit for me. However, if this doesn't affect your use, it's a very quiet and nice purifier. Bonus points for coming with a USB-USB-C cable and the unit is UL certified for safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I keep this nearby for clean air. It is aesthetically pleasing and compact. I used it in the hotel on a recent trip outside of the US. It seemed to work well but the one thing is this won’t turn on when unplugged. So, it does not appear to be wireless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits nicely on my desk.
reviews.reviewText: I liked that it pulls all sorts of stuff out of the air as I have to clean it often. 5/5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing little machine!
reviews.reviewText: My son got this for my office at work, I work in a mine so it gets very dusty and I was starting to have sinus problems from all the dust. This seriously is amazing, not only have my sinus problems improved, everyone has been making comments that my office smells so clean, which is a very unusual thing to smell in a mine. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. No existe ningún tipo de nivel de succión, como les presento en el video, esta en el nv 2 and CERO succión 👎🏼👎🏼Hice también la prueba con dos cerillos, los encendí, los apague, y el humo de los dos cerillos ni siquiera entraron por los filtros estando al lado del filtro de esto.... Es una estafa ya que en realidad esto es un mini abanico que no hecha casi nada de aire y la succión no existe. Ese filtro que tiene adentro solo es marketing 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼Lo recibí hoy y manana lo devolveré
